segments.text: Excuse me , can you tell me where the breakfast cereals are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're in aisle 2A , down that way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are the snack foods in that area , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they're in ... let me think ... Aisle 3B , if I remember right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'll go take a look . Thank you so much for your help .
segments.speaker: S1
